00026 // ========================================

00042 /** @addtogroup HT32F5xxxx_System_Private_Defines
00043   * @{
00044   */
00045 /*
00046 //-------- <<< Use Configuration Wizard in Context Menu >>> ------------------
00047 */
00048 
00049 /*--------------------- Clock Configuration ----------------------------------
00050 //
00051 //    <q1> Enable High Speed External Crystal Oscillator (HSE)
00052 //          <i> Default HSE = DISABLE
00053 //
00054 //    <e3> Enable PLL
00055 //                <i> Default PLL = DISABLE
00056 //                <i> PLL Out = (((HSE or HSI) / SRC_DIV) x NF2 ) / NO2
00057 //        <o4>  PLL Clock Source
00058 //                <0=> CK_HSE
00059 //                <1=> CK_HSI
00060 //                <i> Default PLL clock source = CK_HSI
00061 //                <i> PLL source clock must be in the range of 4 MHz to 16 MHz
00062 //        <o5>  PLL Clock Source Divider (SRC_DIV)
00063 //                <0=> 1
00064 //                <1=> 2
00065 //                <i> PLL input clock = PLL Clock Source / (SRC_DIV)
00066 //        <o6>  PLL Feedback Clock Divider (NF2): 1 ~ 16
00067 //                <1-16:1>
00068 //                <i> PLL feedback clock = PLL input clock x NF2
00069 //                <i> PLL feedback clock must be in the range of 24 MHz to 48 MHz
00070 //        <o7>  PLL Output Clock Divider (NO2)
00071 //                <0=> 1
00072 //                <1=> 2
00073 //                <2=> 4
00074 //                <3=> 8
00075 //                <i> PLL output clock = PLL feedback clock / NO2
00076 //                <i> PLL output clock must be in the range of 4 MHz to 48 MHz
00077 //    </e>
00078 //
00079 //    <h> SystemCoreClock Configuration (CK_AHB)
00080 //      <o8>    SystemCoreClock Source
00081 //                <1=> CK_PLL
00082 //                <2=> CK_HSE
00083 //                <3=> CK_HSI
00084 //                <7=> CK_LSI
00085 //                <i> Default SystemCoreClock source = CK_HSI
00086 //      <o9>   SystemCoreClock Source Divider
00087 //                <0=> 1
00088 //                <1=> 2
00089 //                <2=> 4
00090 //                <3=> 8
00091 //                <4=> 16
00092 //                <5=> 32
00093 //                <i> Default SystemCoreClock source divider = 1
00094 //    </h>
00095 //
00096 //    <h> FLASH Configuration
00097 //      <o10>   Wait state
00098 //                <0=> 0 WS
00099 //                <1=> 1 WS
00100 //                <2=> 2 WS
00101 //                <9=> AUTO
00102 //                <i>   0 WS:  1 kHz <= CK_AHB <= 20 MHz
00103 //                <i>   1 WS: 20 MHz <  CK_AHB <= 40 MHz
00104 //                <i>   2 WS: 40 MHz <  CK_AHB <= 48 MHz
00105 //      <q11>   Pre-fetch Buffer Enable
00106 //                <i> Default pre-fetch buffer = ENABLE
00107 //    </h>
00108 */
00109 
00110 /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00111    HSI must keep turn on when doing the Flash operation (Erase/Program).
00112 */
00113 
00114 /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00115  * How to adjust the value of High Speed External oscillator (HSE)?
00116    The default value of HSE is define by "HSE_VALUE" in "ht32fxxxxx_nn.h".
00117    If your board uses a different HSE speed, please add a new compiler preprocessor
00118    C define, "HSE_VALUE=n000000" ("n" represents n MHz) in the toolchain/IDE,
00119    or edit the "HSE_VALUE" in the "ht32f5xxxx_conf.h" file.
00120    Take Keil MDK-ARM for instance, to set HSE as 16 MHz:
00121    "Option of Taret -> C/C++ > Preprocessor Symbols"
00122       Define: USE_HT32_DRIVER, USE_HT32Fxxxxx_SK, USE_HT32Fxxxxx_xx, USE_MEM_HT32Fxxxxx, HSE_VALUE=16000000
00123                                                                                          ^^ Add "HSE_VALUE"
00124                                                                                             define as above.
00125 */
00126 #define HSI_ENABLE        (1)     /*!< 0: DISABLE,  1: ENABLE                                               */
00127 #define HSE_ENABLE        (1)     /*!< 0: DISABLE,  1: ENABLE                                               */
00128 #define LSI_ENABLE        (1)     /*!< 0: DISABLE,  1: ENABLE                                               */
00129 #define PLL_ENABLE        (1)     /*!< 0: DISABLE,  1: ENABLE                                               */
00130 #define PLL_CLK_SRC       (0)     /*!< 0: HSE,      1: HSI                                                  */
00131 #define PLL_CLK_SRC_DIV   (0)     /*!< 0: DIV1,     1: DIV2                                                 */
00132 #define PLL_NF2_DIV       (4)     /*!< 1~16: DIV1~DIV16                                                     */
00133 #define PLL_NO2_DIV       (0)     /*!< 0: DIV1,     1: DIV2,   2: DIV4,   3: DIV8                           */
00134 #define HCLK_SRC          (1)     /*!< 0: PLL,      1: PLL,    2: HSE,    3: HSI                7: LSI      */
00135 #define HCLK_DIV          (0)     /*!< 0: DIV1,     1: DIV2,   2: DIV4,   3: DIV8,   4: DIV16,  5: DIV32    */
00136 #define WAIT_STATE        (9)     /*!< 0: WS = 0,   1: WS = 1, 2: WS = 2,            9: AUTO                */
00137 #define PRE_FETCH_ENABLE  (1)     /*!< 0: DISABLE,  1: ENABLE                                               */
00138 #define DEINIT_ENABLE     (1)     /* Set 0 for reduce code size                                             */
00139 
00140 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00141 /* PLL Out = (((HSE or HSI) / (PLL_CLK_SRC_DIV + 1)) x PLL_NF2) / PLL_NO2                                   */
00142 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00143 
00144 
00145 /*--------------------- WDT Configuration ----------------------------------
00146 //
00147 //    <e0> Enable WDT Configuration
00148 //      <o1> WDT Prescaler Selection
00149 //           <0=> CK_WDT / 1
00150 //           <1=> CK_WDT / 2
00151 //           <2=> CK_WDT / 4
00152 //           <3=> CK_WDT / 8
00153 //           <4=> CK_WDT / 16
00154 //           <5=> CK_WDT / 32
00155 //           <6=> CK_WDT / 64
00156 //           <7=> CK_WDT / 128
00157 //      <o2> WDT Reload Value <1-4095:1>
00158 //      <q3> Enable WDT Reset function
00159 //      <o4> WDT Sleep Halt mode
00160 //           <0=> No halt
00161 //           <1=> Halt in DeepSleep1
00162 //           <2=> Halt in Sleep & DeepSleep1
00163 //   </e>
00164 */
00165 #define WDT_ENABLE        (0)     /*!< 0: DISABLE,  1: ENABLE                                               */
00166 #define WDT_PRESCALER     (5)     /*!< 0: 1/1, 1: 1/2, 2: 1/4, 3: 1/8, 4: 1/16, 5: 1/32, 6: 1/64, 7: 1/128  */
00167 #define WDT_RELOAD        (2000)  /*!< 0 ~ 4095, 12 bit                                                     */
00168 #define WDT_RESET_ENABLE  (1)     /*!< 0: No Reset, 1: Reset when WDT over flow                             */
00169 #define WDT_SLEEP_HALT    (2)     /*!< 0: No halt,  1: Halt in DeepSleep1, 2: Halt in Sleep & DeepSleep1    */
00170 
00171 /**
00172  * @brief Check HSI frequency
00173  */
00174 #if (HSI_VALUE != 8000000UL)
00175   #error "CK_HSI clock issue: must be 8 MHz!"
00176 #endif
00177 
00178 /**
00179  * @brief Check HSE frequency
00180  */
00181 #if ((HSE_VALUE < 4000000UL) || (HSE_VALUE > 16000000UL))
00182   #error "CK_HSE clock issue: must be in the range of 4 MHz to 16 MHz!"
00183 #endif
00184 
00185 /**
00186  * @brief Check LSI frequency
00187  */
00188 #if (LSI_VALUE != 32000UL)
00189   #error "CK_LSI clock issue: must be 32 kHz!"
00190 #endif
00191 
00192 /**
00193  * @brief CK_PLL definition
00194  */
00195 #if (PLL_ENABLE == 1)
00196   /* Get CK_VCO frequency                                                                                   */
00197   #if (PLL_CLK_SRC == 1)
00198     #if (HSI_ENABLE == 0)
00199       #error "CK_PLL clock source issue: HSI has not been enabled"
00200     #else
00201       #define __CK_VCO    ((HSI_VALUE >> PLL_CLK_SRC_DIV) * PLL_NF2_DIV)   /*!< Select HSI as PLL source    */
00202     #endif
00203   #else
00204     #if (HSE_ENABLE == 0)
00205       #error "CK_PLL clock source issue: HSE has not been enabled!"
00206     #else
00207       #define __CK_VCO    ((HSE_VALUE >> PLL_CLK_SRC_DIV) * PLL_NF2_DIV)  /*!< Select HSE as PLL source     */
00208     #endif
00209   #endif
00210 
00211   #define VCO_MIN 24000000UL
00212   #define VCO_MAX 48000000UL
00213   #define PLL_MIN  4000000UL
00214   #define PLL_MAX 48000000UL
00215 
00216   /* Check CK_VCO frequency                                                                                 */
00217   #if ((__CK_VCO < VCO_MIN) || (__CK_VCO > VCO_MAX))
00218     #error "CK_VCO clock issue: must be in the range!"
00219   #endif
00220 
00221   #define __CK_PLL    (__CK_VCO >> PLL_NO2_DIV)                 /*!< Get CK_PLL frequency                   */
00222 
00223   /* Check CK_PLL frequency                                                                                 */
00224   #if ((__CK_PLL < PLL_MIN) || (__CK_PLL > PLL_MAX))
00225     #error "CK_PLL clock issue: must be in the range!"
00226   #endif
00227 #endif
00228 
00229 /**
00230  * @brief CK_SYS definition
00231  */
00232 #if (HCLK_SRC == 1)
00233   #if (PLL_ENABLE == 1)
00234     #define __CK_SYS    __CK_PLL              /*!< Select PLL as CK_SYS source                              */
00235   #else
00236     #error "CK_SYS clock source issue: PLL is not enable!"
00237   #endif
00238 #elif (HCLK_SRC == 2)
00239   #if (HSE_ENABLE == 1)
00240     #define __CK_SYS    HSE_VALUE             /*!< Select HSE as CK_SYS source                              */
00241   #else
00242     #error "CK_SYS clock source issue: HSE is not enable!"
00243   #endif
00244 #elif (HCLK_SRC == 3)
00245   #if (HSI_ENABLE == 1)
00246     #define __CK_SYS    HSI_VALUE             /*!< Select HSI as CK_SYS source                              */
00247   #else
00248     #error "CK_SYS clock source issue: HSI is not enable!"
00249   #endif
00250 #elif (HCLK_SRC == 7)
00251   #if (LSI_ENABLE == 1)
00252     #define __CK_SYS    LSI_VALUE             /*!< Select LSI as CK_SYS source                              */
00253   #else
00254     #error "CK_SYS clock source issue: LSI is not enable!"
00255   #endif
00256 #else
00257   #error "CK_SYS clock source issue: No clock source is selected!"
00258 #endif
00259 
00260 /**
00261  * @brief CK_AHB definition
00262  */
00263 #define __CK_AHB    (__CK_SYS >> HCLK_DIV)    /*!< Get CK_AHB frequency                                     */
00264 
00265 #define CKAHB_MIN 1000UL
00266 #define CKAHB_MAX 48000000UL
00267 #define WS0_CLK   20000000UL
00268 #define WS1_CLK   40000000UL
00269 
00270 /* Check CK_AHB frequency                                                                                   */
00271 #if ((__CK_AHB < CKAHB_MIN) || (__CK_AHB > CKAHB_MAX))
00272   #error "CK_AHB clock issue: must be in the range!"
00273 #endif
00274 
00275 /* Check FLASH wait-state setting                                                                           */
00276 #if ((__CK_AHB > WS1_CLK) && (WAIT_STATE < 2) || \
00277      (__CK_AHB > WS0_CLK) && (WAIT_STATE < 1))
00278   #error "FLASH wait state configuration issue!"
00279 #endif
00280 /**
00281   * @}
00282   */
00283 
00284 /** @addtogroup HT32F5xxxx_System_Private_Variables
00285   * @{
00286   */
00287 __IO uint32_t SystemCoreClock = __CK_AHB;   /*!< SystemCoreClock = CK_AHB                                   */
00288 /**
00289   * @}
00290   */
00291 
00292 /** @addtogroup HT32F5xxxx_System_Private_Functions
00293   * @{
00294   */
00295 
00296 /**
00297   * @brief  Setup the microcontroller system.
00298   *         Initializes the system clocks and the embedded Flash.
00299   * @note   This function should be used after reset.
00300   * @retval None
00301   */
00302 void SystemInit(void)
00303 {
00304 #if (WDT_ENABLE == 1)
00305   HT_CKCU->APBCCR1 |= (0x1 << 4);
00306   HT_WDT->PR = 0x35CA;
00307   HT_WDT->MR0 = 0;
00308   HT_WDT->MR1 = ((HT_WDT->MR1 & 0xFFF) | (WDT_PRESCALER << 12));
00309   HT_WDT->MR0 = WDT_RELOAD | (WDT_RESET_ENABLE << 13) | (WDT_SLEEP_HALT << 14) | (0x1 << 16);
00310   HT_WDT->CR = 0x5FA00001;
00311 #else
00312   #if (DEINIT_ENABLE == 1)
00313   HT_RSTCU->APBPRST1 = (1 << 4);
00314   #endif
00315 #endif
00316 
00317   SetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->APBCCR1), 6);                       /* enable VDD power domain register clock   */
00318 
00319   #if (DEINIT_ENABLE == 1)
00320   /* De-init the setting                                                                                    */
00321   ResetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->AHBCCR), 11);                     /* disable IP who may use PLL as source     */
00322   SetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCCR), 11);                         /* enable HSI                               */
00323   while (!GetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCSR), 3));                 /* wait for HSI ready                       */
00324   HT_CKCU->GCCR = ((HT_CKCU->GCCR & ~7UL) | 3UL);               /* select CK_SYS source                     */
00325   while ((HT_CKCU->CKST & 7UL) != 3UL);                         /* wait for clock switch complete           */
00326   HT_FLASH->CFCR = (((HT_FLASH->CFCR) & ~7UL) | 1UL);           /* set Wait State as 0 WS                   */
00327   HT_CKCU->AHBCFGR = 0;                                         /* set CK_AHB prescaler                     */
00328   ResetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCCR), 9);                        /* disable PLL                              */
00329   SetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCFGR), 8);                         /* select PLL source as HSI                 */
00330   #endif
00331 
00332   /* HSE initiation                                                                                         */
00333 #if (HSE_ENABLE == 1)
00334   SetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCCR), 10);                         /* enable HSE                               */
00335   while (!GetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCSR), 2)){};               /* wait for HSE ready                       */
00336 #endif
00337 
00338   ResetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->APBCCR1), 6);                     /* disable VDD power domain register clock  */
00339 
00340   /* LSI initiation                                                                                         */
00341 #if (HCLK_SRC == 7)
00342   while (!GetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCSR), 5)){};               /* wait for LSI ready                       */
00343 #endif
00344 
00345   /* PLL initiation                                                                                         */
00346 #if (PLL_ENABLE == 1)
00347   HT_CKCU->PLLCFGR = ((PLL_NF2_DIV & 0x0F) << 23) | (PLL_NO2_DIV << 21);  /* set PLL divider                */
00348 
00349   #if (PLL_CLK_SRC_DIV == 1)
00350     SetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->PLLCFGR), 28);                    /* set PLL clock source divider             */
00351   #else
00352     ResetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->PLLCFGR), 28);                  /* reset PLL clock source divider           */
00353   #endif
00354 
00355   #if (PLL_CLK_SRC == 0)
00356     ResetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCFGR), 8);                     /* select PLL source as HSE                 */
00357   #else
00358     SetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCFGR), 8);                       /* select PLL source as HSI                 */
00359   #endif
00360 
00361   SetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCCR), 9);                          /* enable PLL                               */
00362   while (!GetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCSR), 1)){};               /* wait for PLL ready                       */
00363 #endif
00364 
00365   /* CK_AHB initiation                                                                                      */
00366 #if (WAIT_STATE == 9)
00367   #if (__CK_AHB > WS1_CLK)
00368     HT_FLASH->CFCR = (((HT_FLASH->CFCR) & ~7UL) | 3UL);         /* auto-select wait state                   */
00369   #elif (__CK_AHB > WS0_CLK)
00370     HT_FLASH->CFCR = (((HT_FLASH->CFCR) & ~7UL) | 2UL);         /* auto-select wait state                   */
00371   #endif
00372 #else
00373   HT_FLASH->CFCR = (((HT_FLASH->CFCR) & ~7UL) | (WAIT_STATE + 1));        /* manual wait state              */
00374 #endif
00375 
00376   HT_CKCU->AHBCFGR = HCLK_DIV;                                  /* set CK_AHB prescaler                     */
00377   HT_CKCU->GCCR = ((HT_CKCU->GCCR & ~7UL) | HCLK_SRC);          /* select CK_SYS source                     */
00378   while ((HT_CKCU->CKST & 7UL) != HCLK_SRC);                    /* wait for clock switch complete           */
00379 
00380   /* Pre-fetch buffer configuration                                                                         */
00381 #if (PRE_FETCH_ENABLE == 0)
00382   ResetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_FLASH->CFCR), 4);               /* 0: pre-fetch disable, 1: pre-fetch enable        */
00383 #else
00384   SetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_FLASH->CFCR), 4);                 /* 0: pre-fetch disable, 1: pre-fetch enable        */
00385 #endif
00386 
00387   /* HSE power down                                                                                         */
00388 #if ((HSE_ENABLE == 0) && (HCLK_SRC != 2) && ((PLL_ENABLE == 0) || (PLL_CLK_SRC == 1)))
00389   ResetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCCR), 10);
00390 #endif
00391 
00392   /* HSI power down                                                                                         */
00393 #if ((HSI_ENABLE == 0) && (HCLK_SRC != 3) && ((PLL_ENABLE == 0) || (PLL_CLK_SRC == 0)))
00394   ResetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCCR), 11);
00395 #endif
00396 }
00397 
00398 /**
00399   * @brief  Update SystemCoreClock
00400   * @retval None
00401   */
00402 void SystemCoreClockUpdate(void)
00403 {
00404   u32 SystemCoreClockDiv = HT_CKCU->AHBCFGR & 7UL;
00405   u32 PllSourceClockDiv = (HT_CKCU->PLLCFGR >> 28) & 1UL;
00406   u32 PllFeedbackClockDiv = (((HT_CKCU->PLLCFGR >> 23) & 15UL) == 0) ? (16) : ((HT_CKCU->PLLCFGR >> 23) & 15UL);
00407   u32 PllOutputClockDiv = (HT_CKCU->PLLCFGR >> 21) & 3UL;
00408   u32 SystemCoreClockSrc = HT_CKCU->CKST & 7UL;
00409 
00410   /* Get system core clock according to global clock control & configuration registers                      */
00411   if (SystemCoreClockSrc == 1)
00412   {
00413     if (GetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->PLLCR), 31))
00414     {
00415       PllFeedbackClockDiv = 1;
00416       PllOutputClockDiv = 0;
00417     }
00418 
00419     if (GetBit_BB((u32)(&HT_CKCU->GCFGR), 8))
00420     {
00421       SystemCoreClock = (((HSI_VALUE >> PllSourceClockDiv) * PllFeedbackClockDiv) >> PllOutputClockDiv) >> SystemCoreClockDiv;
00422     }
00423     else
00424     {
00425       SystemCoreClock = (((HSE_VALUE >> PllSourceClockDiv) * PllFeedbackClockDiv) >> PllOutputClockDiv) >> SystemCoreClockDiv;
00426     }
00427   }
00428   else if (SystemCoreClockSrc == 2)
00429   {
00430     SystemCoreClock = HSE_VALUE >> SystemCoreClockDiv;
00431   }
00432   else if (SystemCoreClockSrc == 3)
00433   {
00434     SystemCoreClock = HSI_VALUE >> SystemCoreClockDiv;
00435   }
00436   else if (SystemCoreClockSrc == 7)
00437   {
00438     SystemCoreClock = LSI_VALUE >> SystemCoreClockDiv;
00439   }
00440 }
